languages.text: Варп-мерзость просочилась сквозь тонкую пелену поля Геллера и породила невообразимых тварей противоестественных оттенков. По вокс-системам разносятся крики экипажа и омерзительное хихиканье варп-тварей — нужно немедленное вмешательство!

traits.locale_text: Варп-мерзость просочилась сквозь тонкую пелену поля Геллера и породила невообразимых тварей противоестественных оттенков. По вокс-системам разносятся крики экипажа и омерзительное хихиканье варп-тварей — нужно немедленное вмешательство!

languages.text: A foul warp entity has pierced the thin veil of the Geller field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!
languages.original_text: Варп-мерзость просочилась сквозь тонкую пелену поля Геллера и породила невообразимых тварей противоестественных оттенков. По вокс-системам разносятся крики экипажа и омерзительное хихиканье варп-тварей — нужно немедленное вмешательство!

traits.locale_text: A foul warp entity has pierced the thin film of the Geller Field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!

A foul warp entity has pierced the thin film of the Geller Field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!

A foul warp entity has pierced the thin veil of the Geller field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!

languages.text: 某个邪恶的亚空间实体穿透了盖勒力场的薄纱，在舰船内召唤出了难以名状的扭曲怪物，它们浑身上下泛着诡异的色彩。音阵系统收到了船员的惨叫和亚空间恶魔的可憎狞笑，这样的情况必须立刻进行干预！
languages.original_text: A foul warp entity has pierced the thin veil of the Geller field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!

traits.locale_text: 某个邪恶的亚空间实体穿透了盖勒力场的薄纱，在舰船内召唤出了难以名状的扭曲怪物，它们浑身上下泛着诡异的色彩。音阵系统收到了船员的惨叫和亚空间恶魔的可憎狞笑，这样的情况必须立刻进行干预！

languages.text: Una repugnante entidad de la disformidad ha traspasado el fino velo del Campo Geller y ha engendrado bestias inimaginables de colores antinaturales. Los sistemas voco captan los gritos de la tripulación y las repugnantes risas de los demonios de la disformidad. ¡La situación exige una intervención inmediata!
languages.original_text: A foul warp entity has pierced the thin veil of the Geller field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!

traits.locale_text: Una repugnante entidad de la disformidad ha traspasado el fino velo del Campo Geller y ha engendrado bestias inimaginables de colores antinaturales. Los sistemas voco captan los gritos de la tripulación y las repugnantes risas de los demonios de la disformidad. ¡La situación exige una intervención inmediata!

languages.text: 不快な<歪み>の実体がゲラーフィールドの薄いベールを突き破り、不自然な色の想像を超える獣を生み出した。ヴォクスシステムがクルーの叫び声と<歪み>の悪魔の憎らしい笑い声を拾う…今すぐ介入が必要な事態だ！
languages.original_text: A foul warp entity has pierced the thin veil of the Geller field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!

traits.locale_text: 不快な<歪み>の実体がゲラーフィールドの薄いベールを突き破り、不自然な色の想像を超える獣を生み出した。ヴォクスシステムがクルーの叫び声と<歪み>の悪魔の憎らしい笑い声を拾う…今すぐ介入が必要な事態だ！

languages.text: Une répugnante entité du Warp transperce le voile ténu du champ de Geller, faisant apparaître des bêtes ineffables à la carnation surnaturelle. Les hurlements des membres d'équipage et les ricanements répugnants des démons du Warp résonnent à travers les systèmes-vox... Il faut intervenir immédiatement !
languages.original_text: A foul warp entity has pierced the thin veil of the Geller field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!

traits.locale_text: Une répugnante entité du Warp transperce le voile ténu du champ de Geller, faisant apparaître des bêtes ineffables à la carnation surnaturelle. Les hurlements des membres d'équipage et les ricanements répugnants des démons du Warp résonnent à travers les systèmes-vox... Il faut intervenir immédiatement !

languages.text: Ein schändliches Warpwesen hat den dünnen Schleier des Gellerfelds durchbrochen und unvorstellbare Monster in unnatürlichen Farben hervorgebracht. Die Voxsysteme übertragen die Schreie der Crewmitglieder und das widerwärtige Kichern der Warpmonster — die Situation verlangt ein sofortiges Einschreiten!
languages.original_text: A foul warp entity has pierced the thin veil of the Geller field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!

traits.locale_text: Ein schändliches Warpwesen hat den dünnen Schleier des Gellerfelds durchbrochen und unvorstellbare Monster in unnatürlichen Farben hervorgebracht. Die Voxsysteme übertragen die Schreie der Crewmitglieder und das widerwärtige Kichern der Warpmonster — die Situation verlangt ein sofortiges Einschreiten!

languages.text: Alçak bir öteboyut varlığı, Geller alanının ince örtüsünü delerek doğal olmayan renklerde, akıl almaz yaratıklar ortaya çıkardı. Voks sistemleri, mürettebatın çığlıklarını ve öteboyut mahluklarının iğrenç kahkahalarını kaydediyor. Durum, acil müdahale gerektiriyor!
languages.original_text: A foul warp entity has pierced the thin veil of the Geller field and spawned unimaginable beasts of unnatural hues. The vox-systems are picking up the crewmen's screams and the warp fiends' loathsome giggling — the situation demands immediate intervention!
